Allow creating Home screen shortcuts first. Delete Tap the button in the center to allow Mi Ditto to transcribe speech and system playback audio. Tap the button on the lower right to type your reply. Mi Ditto will read it to the other person. You can tap the button at the bottom of the screen to save transcribed items to Notes. Tap the button on the lower left to minimize Mi Ditto. It will allow you to use other apps. About Mi Ditto Not now Download Install Notes "Looks like you've uninstalled Notes. Download and install Notes again." Create a Home screen shortcut now? "You'll have to grant authorization to be able to use Mi Ditto again after that." Home screen shortcut Revoking authorization "Looks like you haven't updated your Notes app in a while. To be able to save transcribed text to Notes, install the latest version of the app first." Not now Update Update Notes Exit Mi Ditto Advanced Drag minimized app Mi Ditto will transcribe whatever the other person is saying and place the text here. You can type your replies and allow Mi Ditto to read them to the other person. You can save the whole conversation as transcribed text to Notes. "I've learned how to use Mi Ditto!" We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
